message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe is worth more than $150 to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose a price of $200 for it. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $180. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget constraints.
